title: Zone of proximal development study with new toys

content.description: Dr. Belzer documented the behaviors of parents with their children at a local restaurant. She looked for specific examples of permissive, authoritarian, and authoritative parenting styles.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the method of research used by Dr. Belzer?

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
